```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,echo=FALSE}

library(shiny)


ui <- fluidPage(
  
  textInput("ctxName","Introduce your name"),
  textOutput("cotxName")
  
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  str1 = reactive(paste("Name:",input$ctxName))
  output$cotxName = renderText(str1())
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)


```
